title: Plus ou moins miserable
overview: Plus ou moins miserable is a humorous game hosted by Eve Côté in which participants, accompanied by a well-known personality, will have to guess what rating of miserabilism has been assigned to true and crazy stories. Experts gave these embarrassing situations a score between 0 and 100 based on 3 criteria: physical pain, emotional shock and long-term psychological impact. The person who makes the best predictions has a chance to win $3,000!
